name: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner v. Richard Arthur BRAMHALL, Jr., Respondent
name_abbreviation: Office of Disciplinary Counsel v. Bramhall
docket_number: No. 161 Disciplinary Docket No. 3; Disciplinary Board No. 154 DB 95

parties: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner v. Richard Arthur BRAMHALL, Jr., Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 21st day of March, 1996, the Petition for Voluntary Resignation is granted and, pursuant to Rule 215, Pa.R.D.E., it is
ORDERED that the resignation of Richard Arthur Bramhall, Jr., be and it is hereby accepted and he is DISBARRED ON CONSENT from the Bar of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, retroactive to November 13, 1995; and it is further ORDERED that he shall comply with the provisions of Rule 217, Pa.R.D.E. Respondent shall pay costs, if any, to the Disciplinary Board pursuant to Rule 208(g), Pa.R.D.E.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
674 A.2d 1036
OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner v. Richard Arthur BRAMHALL, Jr., Respondent.
No. 161 Disciplinary Docket No. 3.
Disciplinary Board No. 154 DB 95.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 21, 1996.
